Name: Fapic
About the game: Your friend mini crate mitt has been kidnapped! it is up to you, Bach Edwards to travel through time and space, with a mysterious acquaintance, fighting multiple robots to save his little crumpet. Travel through space and time to a gigantic landscape, unlimited enemies, and familiar faces. The button mapping is controller and keyboard/mouse friendly. Breath-Taking Soundtrack Game play time is averaged at 1-1 1/2 hours (using speed run strats). 5 bosses with 1 bonus boss after passing the platform trials. intuitive Combat 2nd person shooter 3-D Plane of motion. Action-Adventure Game 3-D Platforming
